adverbs.description: rantingly (comparative more rantingly, superlative most rantingly)

entries.meaning: With ranting; speaking loudly and angrily.
examples: In short, these are only two different Species of Distraction: The Enthusiast is deeply and sullenly out of his Wits, and the Atheist is merrily and rantingly mad, and both are owing to the same general Cause […]
